li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-home mega-current-menu-item mega-page_item mega-page-item-4 mega-current_page_item mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-item-align-float-left mega-menu-item-25

div.p: Classical education is a traditional, historical, time-tested education of the highest quality, which emerged from the most elevated cultures of the past.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-271

div.p: Parnassus classical methods are integrated in the Trivium (grammar, logic, rhetoric) and Quadrivium (humanities and the sciences) within the Schools of Grammar, Logic, and Rhetoric.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-272

p.strong: The highest standards of academic integrity

div.p: Parnassus believes that children learn through the Classical Trivium approach of grammar, logic, and rhetoric and from a content rich curriculum.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-269

div.p: Parnassus is a tuition-free college preparatory classical school. We welcome all applications!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-276

p.br: Parnassus Preparatory School is a tuition-free, college preparatory classical school. Your support, of any kind, is greatly appreciated.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-270

div.p: Thank you for your interest in Parnassus Preparatory School. Please select one of the links on the right and let us know how we can help you learn more about Parnassus. We look forward to hearing from you.

div.h1: Classical Schooling for the Art of Life
div.p: At Parnassus, teachers, students, and parents share an idealistic aspiration for excellence in academic standards and character development that the ancient Greeks referred to as arête. The Parnassus community values the classical Trivium approach to education and the mission and vision of the school. Parnassus distinguishes itself by focusing on a classical liberal arts education.

div.style: background: url('https://parnassusprep.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/school-placeholder.jpg') no-repeat center; background-size: cover; height: 400px;

div.p: Children in this phase enjoy memorizing and naturally absorb information. Children learn the factual foundations of each subject through songs, rhymes, and recitation.

p.a: LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR SCHOOL OF GRAMMAR

div.style: background: url('https://parnassusprep.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Parnassus_0044.jpg') no-repeat center; background-size: cover; height: 400px;

div.p: Students are interested in cause and effect, and the way facts fit together in a logical framework. They analyze, evaluate, and critique information and begin to think independently.

p.a: LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR SCHOOL OF LOGIC

div.style: background: url('https://parnassusprep.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/PPS0917LR-154-1-e1524766273563.jpg') no-repeat center; background-size: cover; height: 400px;

div.p: Rhetoric is the art of communicating well. Once the student has obtained solid knowledge of the facts and has developed the skills to arrange those facts into arguments, the student learns the art of communication.

p.a: LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR SCHOOL OF RHETORIC

div.p: Critical Thinkers ~ Coherent Writers ~ Confident Speakers ~ Thoughtful Leaders ~ Virtuous Citizens

p.span: Come see for yourself what makes Parnassus unique and discover all the possibilities that are here for your children.

div.p: Parnassus Preparatory School Fourth Level Rhetoric (12th Grade) student Karthik Subramanian has been named as a National Merit Finalist. The… Continue Reading

h2.a: 4R Scholar Karthik Subramanian Named National Merit Semifinalist

div.p: 4R scholar Karthik Subramanian has been named a National Merit Semifinalist in the 2020 National Merit Scholarship Program. Ryan was… Continue Reading
The open enrollment period for the 2020 – 2021 school year will run from October 1st, 2019 until January 31st, 2020! Be sure to visit us at an Informational Meeting and apply online now!

The open enrollment period for the 2019-2020 school year ran from October 1st, 2018 – January 31st, 2019. However, we are still accepting applications for this school year! Contact admissions@parnassusprep.com for more information.
